name: Vel'Koz
title: the Eye of the Void
lore: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to scrutinize and study the physical realm—and the strange, warlike beings that dwell there—for any weakness the Void might exploit. But Vel'Koz is far from a passive observer, striking back at threats with deadly plasma, or by disrupting the very fabric of the world itself.
blurb: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to...
allytips: When laning, use Void Rift to kill minions while building stacks of Organic Deconstruction on your opponent. You can then follow up with your other abilities.
Shooting Plasma Fission diagonally and splitting at maximum range allows you to hit opponents that are out of the range of the initial missile, but is more challenging to pull off.
Be very careful about when to use Life Form Disintegration Ray. Many champions have abilities that can interrupt the spell.
enemytips: Vel'Koz is very dangerous if left alone in a fight. Try to focus him down early.
Vel'Koz has fairly low mobility and is vulnerable to ganks.
Life Form Disintegration Ray can be interrupted by stuns, silences and knockups.

riot_spell_q.name: Plasma Fission
riot_spell_q.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this refunds {{ e2 }}% of the Mana Cost.

riot_spell_w.name: Void Rift
riot_spell_w.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

riot_spell_e.name: Tectonic Disruption
riot_spell_e.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

riot_spell_r.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
riot_spell_r.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.

Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and slowing units hit by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

riot_spell_i.name: Organic Deconstruction
riot_spell_i.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Organic Deconstruction
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] ''Deconstruct'' enemies every time they are hit, stacking up to 3 times. ''Deconstruction'' stacks last for 7 seconds. '''Vel'Koz's''' basic attacks refresh ''Deconstruction'' stacks' duration on-hit.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: Three ''Deconstruction'' stacks are consumed to deal {{pp|33 to 169}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} and briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the enemy.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Plasma Fission
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|First Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires an energy bolt in a line, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, and while the bolt is in the air, '''Vel'Koz''' can reactivate ''Plasma Fission'' and automatically does so upon reaching maximum [[range]] or upon hitting an enemy unit.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: {{sbc|Second Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' splits the energy bolt in two, each firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the original bolt's trajectory as well as copying its effects.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling4: {{st|Mana Restored On-Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield.
* There is a short delay before ''Plasma Fission'' can be reactivated, making the primary bolt travel ~500 units before it can be split.
* If one considers the primary and each secondary bolt as a triangle's legs, and by use of the {{w|Pythagorean theorem}}, ''Plasma Fission's'' would travel ~1521 units diagonally (hypotenuse on each side).

wikia_skill_w1.name: Void Rift
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' stores a charge of ''Void Rift'' periodically, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and leaving behind a trail. After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, the entire trail detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies standing upon it.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2:
{{st|Initial Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* Each damage portions applies an {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}} stack.
* It is not possible to have more than one ''Void Rift'' active at a time.
* '''Vel'Koz''' can cast ''Void Rift'' while moving but not while attacking.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will not destroy the trail created by ''Void Rift'' before being blocked.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Tectonic Disruption
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after {{fd|0.55}} seconds, briefly providing {{tip|sight}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Enemies close to '''Vel'Koz''' at the time of impact are also slightly {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} in the direction of the cast.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Tectonic Disruption's'' suspension is affected by {{ii|Mercury's Treads|Tenacity}} and can be removed ({{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, {{ai|Remove Scurvy|Gangplank}}).
* The required proximity for displacement is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* There is a brief ~{{fd|0.1}} second cast time before the projectile begins to travel.
* Although considered to be a projectile, {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block ''Tectonic Disruption'', but will not destroy it. This is most likely a bug.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstructing}} enemy champions marks them as ''{{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz}}'' for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and ability damage will refresh this duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' [[channel]]s for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and projects an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the cursor. Reactivating ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' immediately ends its effects.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: The ray deals {{as|magic damage}} in {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals to enemies caught in its wake, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20% for 1 second. {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit, up to 3 stacks. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling3: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|45 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|45*10 to 80*10}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* '''Vel'Koz''' will only start {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researching''}} enemies once ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' has been learned.
* If an enemy champion becomes {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} during ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' channel, it will take true damage for the remainder of the channel.
* Enemies standing inside '''Vel'Koz's''' hitbox during ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' will take damage from it, regardless of '''Vel'Koz's''' orientation.
